alert.note: Alert for Adams; Franklin; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Franklin, Webster and south central Adams Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 614 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Riverton, or 34 miles southwest of Hastings, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Inavale around 625 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Bladen, Cowles, Blue Hill and Rosemont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
